text: To Live or Let Die is a 1982 American short documentary film directed by Terry Sanders. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *To Live or Let Die at the American Film Foundation * Category:1982 films Category:1982 short films Category:1982 documentary films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Films directed by Terry Sanders
title: To Live or Let Die
